Let's go to Carelia.

We're talking about people we admire. They have a case, they're working for nothing. Those who need the most -- entrepreneurs, farmers, community -- project“Developing in Carelia”♪

Let's go to Carelia.
23-01-2024

" All right " : as cartels combine history and modern trends

The Carel Brand of Copying " Good " appeared in the Republic recently last March. During that time, his founder, Elina and Anna, had already invented and sewn several collections that had been submitted to the Republic and Moscow. They also became participants in the first Petrozavodsk fashion week. As in their clothing, the authors combine the past and the present, for which they use the old embroidery and archival photographs, in the new edition of the project Delaham in Carelia.

Let's go to Carelia.
28-12-2023

Wat toys with history

Carel Master Veronica Podgorny has been making cotton toys for over seven years. He admits that it's now a huge demand. Veronica's making toys in technology as it used to be, but there are already modern ones among her tree heroes, such as programmers. Where the master draws ideas for plots and when he starts to prepare for New Year, in the newspapers.

Let's go to Carelia.
13-12-2023

Svenirs from the kiln

If dedu Moros is helping to prepare dwarfs and Snegurochka for the holidays, one master, Svetlana Lizov, is making the entire souvenir class at the carel ceramic workshop. The team has artists and managers working with her. But all the jewelry, souvenirs and even the sad spirits she's doing with her hands. Details are in the Delaham in Carelia.

Let's go to Carelia.
15-11-2023

Fresh factory in the kitchen

Cristina Campie is the founder of a new carel candle brand. And now she's more of a candle than a soup. In the collection of the young master of the aromatics of the northern forest, the clubs, the carel berena and even the baths. And most of the daylights she's doing herself, including the Shungitis. For what it takes, how they help the north to survive a long winter, the " Delay in Carelia " project.

Let's go to Carelia.
18-10-2023

Business as a mall

In the spring of Petrozavodsk, there was a “Karel oil”, a small enterprise where oil is made from the lion, the juncture, the almond and not only. He was created by a local resident of Olga Drosdovic. Together with their partner, they are managed with all their responsibilities, ranging from production to marketing and sale of the finished product.

Let's go to Carelia.
11-10-2023

Petrozavodka Koza: Karel shops opened a new souvenir shop

There was a Karel Koza in Petrozavodsk, which brought together the various artsmen. The new souvenir shop is an opportunity for local masters not only to familiarize themselves with their work as tourists and towns, but also to sell things created by their hands. Why did the shop call it that and where Maria Cherpanova brought this idea, a special project called Delaham in Carelia.

Let's go to Carelia.
18-09-2023

Museum bars: from hobby to profession

Tatiana Kirillov lives in Olonc, in the capital of the valleys. And like any real cartel, he can tie. Do you see the barrels in the photo? And the Reverend Church behind the Tanin shoulder? All the matches in this story aren't random.

Let's go to Carelia.
15-08-2023

"Zerno inspires me, "as the classmate traveled from a musician to a farmer

What about chicken, egg, maybe grain? Aleksei Chebaevsky, from Sortavala, adds another entry to the logical task. A man has been engaged in agriculture for several years, and this year there is a lot of yacht and oats. According to the farmer, this is the beginning of a breakthrough project for the region, which will result in its own carel bread, potassium and not only.

Let's go to Carelia.
10-08-2023

For the replacement of candy: Petrosavoca opened the production of sugar-free pastiles from carel berries

Tatiana Goldoven is an engineer. After study, she taught physics, and then, sitting on the decree, decided to start her business. That's how the idea of producing sugar-free pastiles from natural ingredients was created. Tatiana is experimenting with the recipe now that it's established, and recently, along with a co-worker, she came up with a new useful dessert. Details are in the Delaham in Carelia.

Let's go to Carelia.
26-07-2023

" Business is an adventure " : in Carelia, unique material has been created for boxing equipment.

MB Barbell, whose street practicers can be found in almost every Russian city, has developed a material for boxing equipment with no foreign equivalents. What is unique, and what else is being produced by the main domestic producer of street practicers is read in the newspaper.

Let's go to Carelia.
30-06-2023

Went out, like a creative artstor works in Petrozavodsk.

Three craftsmen united in Petrozavodsk and opened a shop of cozy things. Makrame, a wallet, natural barelefs, tissue, urination and knitting, through these crafts, they've gone to one team. Masters work for the order, sell their products on fairs and on Internet resources, and run workshops for children and adults. New heroes in the Project Delaham in Carelia.

Let's go to Carelia.
28-06-2023

New level: the cartel company will become a supplier of the Federal Reiler

In Carelia, a branch of the CRONA Forest Industry Company will soon launch new production. The enterprise will begin to produce a moisture terrace and will take the liberated niche after the departure of European players. Leads the process of Pavel Kullenen, who claims to be the best young industrialist of Russia.

Let's go to Carelia.
23-06-2023

Machine: Tricotax Module returns to Karelia

Tatiana Melnikov is a lawyer who lacked creativity. She once allowed herself to do what she really likes and opened up a small tricottage factory. Her business started with a vest for her daughter, and now in Petrozavodsk it is not only the Vagina factory, but it also opened a firm shop where a large variety of tricottage products is of any kind and age. What is so exocamouflage and why the Soviet ornaments are becoming fashionable again, in the newspapers.

Let's go to Carelia.
31-05-2023

Fire business: As a result of the dominance, a resident of Karelia started to build a copycat.

How to travel from an unsuccessful pedagogical to a designer than the State helps, and why does a man have a smooth board for 55,000, told Natalia Nesterov.

Let's go to Carelia./Society
11-04-2023

Steel decides: in Petrozavodsk, the first show of cartel designers took place

Imigist, Julia Telpina, is implementing a " Steel and Word " project in Petrozavodsk, where for the first time local designers have been shown in the carel capital. Young entrepreneurs presented their evening, sports, city and daily fashion collections. Details on importation with the national collorite are in the " Delaham in Carelia " project.

Let's go to Carelia.
06-04-2023

It's definitely Karelia, about crafts and northern design.

In this project, we usually talk about people who wear and feed the inhabitants of the Republic, simplify and steal their lives. With Svetlana Coulchurina, Director of the Association of Echo, we talked about how to help designers and craftsmen. About what a carel design is and what a souvenir should be, for example, to get it straight: yes, it's the North, Carelia.

Let's go to Carelia.
24-03-2023

Headleg: How does a dress designer work?

Dr. Dumkin's Educator. Worked in Petersburg: restored the iconos, the architectural elements of the blind. Ten years ago, she moved to Petrozavodsk. Born and raised their daughters, there was a free time, and the blank in the capital of Carelia didn't add up. And Lada decided to do the textile.

Let's go to Carelia.
08-03-2023

" To test receptors something new " : a carel entrepreneur makes ice cream from sea and not just

The Laumi Carel Company, in addition to conventional seals and fruit sorbets, creates desserts with laminarium, white mushrooms, and even a rag. Moreover, the Italian word " gelato " is used to describe its products at the enterprise instead of the usual " ice cream " . What is a strange alchemy going on behind the walls of a petronaut factory, the journalists of the Russians were identified.

Let's go to Carelia./Special projects
22-02-2023

Chečevica: An artist from Petrozavodska makes sand dresses for bright girls.

Maria Cherepánova is a designer, an artist, a modeler and founder of the new Chechevica Carel brand. One day, she realized that she was making dresses more than she could wear and decided to sell them all over the country. Of which a sword-smooch creates its bright dresses, why it is important for her to be green and to what age a woman remains a girl, in the project Delaham in Carelia.

Let's go to Carelia.
24-01-2023

Who's the weed? Like a petrosuasian made a business on microsellanes.

Unlike the lucky ones, the Ekaterina Cuzmina garden is a green round year. Her fresh and useful germ goes twice a week to the table of petrosavadians. What weed grows an entrepreneur and what flowers can be eaten, read in the newspaper.
